Articles.Content:
Hi there,

..and thanks for 1.1.3.
jumping right back into the game i had to see that my asteroid class-E where i was building a station on has now my Station in the middle of it, not ON it anymore... to it seems as if the attachment points changed dramatically.

Any idea how thi may happen and how to fix it?

Had kopernicus running when caching the asteroid (and now) - not sure if it changed sth - and it seems to have the same shape now as before.

You would save me many hours of my live! pls help
Yaaaa updating does bad things to saves mate. I hate to say it but you may need to rebuild it.

thanks for your help - found the difference anyway

It was the ART-Mod from Roverdude that changed the asteroid
If you can go back to 1.1.2, un-Klaw everything then re-update, then re-klaw everything.
